edu.vserver.exercises.videoMcq.question

Class QuestionLibrary

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.vserver.exercises.videoMcq.question.QuestionLibrary
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class QuestionLibrary
extends Object
implements Serializable
    QuestionLibrary contains all of the questions for the Video stream.
    Since:
    1.11.2013
    Version:
    v0.1
    Author:
    Sami Holck, Juha Mäkilä
